description: This source file implements advanced worker functions for the CCSP CWMP TCP Connection Request Handler, including accepting connections, setting output, removing connections, querying requests, processing sync and async data, handling send completion, and notifications. It manages TCP socket connections for the protocol and includes functions for connection acceptance, removal, data processing, and event notifications.

methods.name: BOOL CcspCwmpTcpcrhoDstowoAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PANSC_HANDLE phClientContext)
methods.description: Accepts a new client connection on a TCP socket, logs connection info, allocates buffer descriptor, and sets buffer context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoDstowoSetOut(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Sets the output socket; currently a no-op returning success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoDstowoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Removes a client connection, frees buffer descriptor, and cleans up socket contexts.

methods.name: ULONG CcspCwmpTcpcrhoDstowoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes incoming data, determines request completeness, and sets process mode and session mode.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoDstowoProcessSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes synchronized data received from the client, handles request processing, and possibly closes the connection.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoDstowoProcessAsync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Placeholder for asynchronous data processing; currently not applicable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoDstowoSendComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved,ANSC_STATUS status)
methods.description: Handles completion of data send operations; currently a no-op.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoDstowoNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ULONG ulEvent,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles socket events (error, close, resource, timeout), performs cleanup or logging accordingly.
